OOC:Yea Trinity is on a lock by so she can't get out...but Grounded is
in the base anyways.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: Will shield stop TRinity this time?
>
> Trinity:
>
> "GROUNNNNNDEEEEDD !!!!" cried Trinity and ran out side trying to help
> him...
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > The Chivtrons base fully recharge as they begin to suck the power
> from
> > the vines covered around it. The vines begin to go limp and die
> > reavealing a a fully charged shield thanks to the button Trinity
> > pushed. Grounded falls to the ground barely breathing. His power
> also
> > is sucked from his connection to the natural forms. However life
> > always regrows and he stands up and stumbles to the defensive
> weapons
> > chair, deciding to leave the shields and other programs to this
> > jealous bot.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
